item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1 in 5 Online Job Postings Are Either Fake or Never Filled (155 points | 116 comments)
2. Millions of Accounts Vulnerable Due to Google's OAuth Flaw (16 points | 6 comments)
3. In the Belly of the MrBeast (297 points | 179 comments)
4. Making an Intersection Unsafe for Pedestrians to Save Seconds for Drivers (213 points | 252 comments)
5. Allstate used GasBuddy and other apps to track driving behavior (22 points | 5 comments)
6. Proton: We're giving away over $1M to support a better internet (83 points | 25 comments)
7. Reversible Computing Escapes the Lab (104 points | 20 comments)
8. Show HN: A blocklist to remove spam and bad websites from search results (68 points | 32 comments)
9. Dbt Labs acquires SDF Labs to accelerate the dbt developer experience (18 points | 11 comments)
10. Snyk security researcher deploys malicious NPM packages targeting cursor.com (514 points | 252 comments)
11. Craniometrix (YC W22) Is Hiring Founding Engineer on CTO Track ( | hide)
12. PostgreSQL Is the Database Management System of the Year 2024 (220 points | 67 comments)
13. Carnarvon's NASA satellite dish receives first signal in almost 40 years (59 points | 12 comments)
14. A couple CSS tricks for HTML Dialog elements (52 points | 14 comments)
15. Using Coding Skills to Make Passive Income (104 points | 50 comments)

18. LLM based agents as Dungeon Masters (44 points | 54 comments)
19. Fluid Simulation Pendant (440 points | 61 comments)
20. I Switched to Firefox and Never Looked Back (395 points | 332 comments)
21. The Plunge (2014) (152 points | 21 comments)
22. Robinhood to Pay $45M SEC Settlement over Data Breach, Other Violations (68 points | 9 comments)
23. Lines of code that will beat A/B testing every time (2012) (355 points | 145 comments)
24. Meta announces 5% cuts in preparation for 'intense year' (3 points | 2 comments)
25. X-ray flashes from nearby supermassive black hole accelerate mysteriously (55 points | 1 comment)
26. Inconvenient truths about the fires burning in Los Angeles from two fire experts (26 points | 25 comments)
27. A secure distributed actor language (68 points | 25 comments)
28. Servo vs. steppers: Speed, Torque and Accuracy [video] (35 points | 4 comments)
29. Voyage-code-3 (96 points | 25 comments)
30. Dragonfly's extreme loop-the-loops (107 points | 38 comments)
